awd_titl_txt: Acquisition of a Multianvil Facility for Deformation of     Deep Mantle Phases
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides partial funding to establish a multianvil              rock deformation facility for the Tectonophysics Laboratory in the              Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics at the University of              California, Riverside. The University is committed to providing the             remaining funds necessary.                                                           The equipment will allow deformation experiments on rock                   samples of Earth's mantle at pressures ranging up to 25 GPa,                    equivalent to depths of 700 kilometers. The experiments will be                 directed at understanding the mechanisms by which Earth's mantle                rocks flow at depth and how very deep-seated earthquakes originate.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA AT RIVERSIDE
